SELECT COUNT(*) AS reqClass FROM FIT_CLASS f, TRAINER_REGISTER t WHERE f.TRAINER_ID = t.TRAINER_ID AND t.TRAINER_ID = #{id} AND f.CLS_STATUS = 'CS00'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS ingClass FROM FIT_CLASS f, TRAINER_REGISTER t WHERE f.TRAINER_ID = t.TRAINER_ID AND t.TRAINER_ID = #{id} AND f.CLS_STATUS = 'CS01' AND f.START_DATE <= SYSDATE AND f.END_DATE > SYSDATE
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(p.NET_PRICE), 0), '999,999,999') as totalCal FROM FIT_CLASS f, PAYMENT P WHERE f.CLS_CODE = p.CLS_CODE AND f.TRAINER_ID = #{id} AND TO_CHAR(f.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE
